item.title: Vedanta: The ancient wisdom
item.description: Let’s get some perspective We go through life and have a variety of experiences, and we read these experiences based on our likes/dislikes, our sense of good/bad, and whether is makes us feel pleasant/unpleasant. Let’s call this our “preferences”. We see that our preferences have some default inclination, and that it evolves with time based on our experiences. For most people alive, they live and die following their preferences. If something happens which they consider good or pleasant, they feel happy.
